title: [QUESTION] Getting Exception While Trying to Port SKSwapChainPanel to WinUI 3
body:
<!--

You can ask questions here, but there might be better places to do that as well:

 - If you have questions on how to use SkiaSharp with .NET, this is the best place.
 - If you have questions on how to draw a picture, but need some suggestions, there is the community to help:
    - StackOverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/skiasharp
    - Xamarin Forums: https://forums.xamarin.com
    - Gitter.im Chat: https://gitter.im/xamarin/XamarinComponents
 - If you have questions on skia, or need to ask more advanced questions about the native API, the skia Group is the place to go: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/skia-discuss

But... If you still aren't sure about where to ask your question, then go ahead and ask here! We will try and answer you, but if we can't, then we will help you get the answers you want.

--> Hi Friends,

I am using SKXamlCanvas into my current project but It has some performance issue. When I add lots of graphical shapes to canvas, zooming and panning started getting extremely slow so, I looked around and found out that the SKSwapChainPanel uses OpenGL which could solve my problem. As of now, SKSwapChainPanel is only available in UWP so, I decided to port it to WinUI3 my self. I downloaded latest code and removed comments from **AngleSwapChainPanel.cs & SKSwapChainPanel.cs**. I am able to compile/build fine but as soon as I add generated **SkiaSharp.dll & SkiaSharp.Views.Windows.dll** files to my Test project, I get following exception (see attached image below). I tried to clean rebuild many times without any luck. I also tried to compiled with x64 both projects as well.

I am using Visual Studio 2022, MSIX 1.0.

Can somebody please let me know what I am missing here? Please let me know if you want me to upload my project solutions here.

Thanks In Advance,
Amit Parmar

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19598410/147265444-eb65be5a-6d5e-48ec-8cb1-455e23e34394.png)
